hero.title: Tracking
hero.description: Our tracking tools give you control over your shipments and help you stay informed so you can ship with confidence.

tracking_info.title: Track the way you like it
tracking_info.description: Do you need the status of your shipment or proof of delivery? Enter your tracking number or reference number below.

tracking_options_info.title: Advanced Tracking
tracking_options_info.description: For a detailed tracking experience, log in to quickly and conveniently access the information you need. Get the status of your shipments by filtering by date range or zip code. No need to enter a tracking or reference number.

tracking_options_info.title: Track by reference
tracking_options_info.description: Receive status updates regarding your package without having to log in. Track with your personalized reference number.

tracking_options_info.title: Track by number
tracking_options_info.description: Track your local shipments instantly with a single button click. No need to login. Use your tracking number to access the latest package status, delivery routes, and estimated delivery times.
